fields.name: Tea
fields.description: A hot or cold beverage made from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant, typically enjoyed with or without milk and sugar.

fields.name: Espresso
fields.description: A strong, concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans, often served in small portions.

fields.name: Red Wine
fields.description: A type of wine made from dark-colored grape varieties, known for its rich flavors and tannins, often served with red meats or cheese.

fields.name: Coffee
fields.description: A brewed beverage made from roasted coffee beans, commonly served hot or cold, and enjoyed with or without milk and sugar.

fields.name: Lemonade
fields.description: A refreshing drink made from lemon juice, water, and sugar, often served chilled, and a popular beverage in warm weather.

fields.name: Milk
fields.description: Cold and refreshing. Non dairy options also available.
